subject: Medicine
title: Diet and Cholesterol
description: A short lesson to help you apply Diet and Cholesterol.

hook.text: Cholesterol is not all bad; your body actually needs it.

buildup.text: LDL cholesterol can deposit fat inside artery walls.

discovery.text: HDL cholesterol carries fat away from arteries to the liver.

twist.text: Eating fiber can lower LDL more than cutting all fat.

climax.text: A balanced diet keeps the LDL-to-HDL ratio healthy.

punchline.text: Good cholesterol cleans up after the bad.
